verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There's a peace I've come to know newline though my heart and flesh may fail newline There's an anchor for my soul, newline I can say "it is well!"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus has overcome and the grave is overwhelmed newline The victory is won, newline He has risen from the dead.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And I will rise when he calls my name newline No more sorrow, no more pain, newline I will rise on eagle's wings, newline Before my God, fall on my knees newline And rise, I will rise

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There's a day that's drawing near, newline When the darkness breaks to light, newline And the shadows disappear newline and my faith shall be my eyes

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And I hear the voice of many angles sing newline Worthy is the lamb newline And I hear the cry of every longing heart newline Worthy is the lamb.
